title: How can I report a summoner from in client chat?
body: I have screenshots of a player harassing me after game and would love to report him for the actions but I know i can't name names on the boards so how do I report if it wasn't in game?

replies.body: It's good not to call people out here on the boards, but we can still try to help out! It's always best to use the report feature in the post game screen, but go ahead and take those screenshots and shoot them our way in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!
